results.definition: the act of separating grain from chaff
examples: the winnowing was done by women

results.definition: separate the chaff from by using air currents
examples: She stood there winnowing chaff all day in the field
The wind was winnowing her hair

results.definition: select desirable parts from a group or list
examples: cull out the interesting letters from the poet's correspondence
winnow the finalists from the long list of applicants

results.definition: blow away or off with a current of air
